General.Name: PT Murni Sadar Tbk
General.Description: PT Murni Sadar Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in operating private hospitals. The company is headquartered in Medan, Indonesia. PT Murni Sadar Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Sumatera Teknindo.
